title: What if Vayne's W dealt current health damage?
body: How bad will this affect her win rate? On a scale of 1 to 10.

replies.body: It would be broken early game and fall off later on

> [{quoted}](name=Abibyama II,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bReRbeTQ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-03-25T10:33:03.604+0000)
>
> It would be broken early game and fall off later on

More broken than %MAX HP damage is now? Let's do some math.

For simplicity, let's say her 3rd deals 20% MAX HP. Let's also say her regular autos without the 3rd shot do no damage for this example.

3 shots -> 80% HP remaining
6 shots -> 60% HP remaining
9 Shots -> 40% HP remaining
12 shots -> 20% HP remaining
15 shots -> Dead

New math - Simplicity's sake, her 3rd now deals 20% CURRENT HP. Assuming her regular autos deal no damage.

3 shots -> 80% HP remaining
6 shots -> 64% HP remaining
9 shots -> 51.20% HP remaining
12 shots -> 40.96% HP remaining
15 shots -> 32.77% HP remaining.

As you can see from the math, if her Silver Bolts was shifted from %MAX to %CURRENT, she's good at shredding down tanks and other high HP threats, and tapers off the weaker they get. HOWEVER, this isn't even factoring in her auto attacks OR critical hits. There is not a single reason on this green earth why they couldn't make her do %CURRENT HP damage instead of max. She's going to be dealing huge chunks as it is, since it's true damage, and she's already building standard ADC crit builds and/or BORK for additional damage. The %MAX HP damage is just complete overkill, and unnecessary on her, since it just ends up severely harming squishier targets who cannot deal with her auto attacks and the constant %HP shred.

I'd say somewhere 1-3 on your scale, as in "suggested change won't influence her winrates at all or very slightly". There are no tanks to kill, her Q while R is busted as fuck so she just uses that to kill anyone plus overbloated ADC stats everywhere, so she won't even notice the change while critting for 500-600.
Maybe make her into a better tank buster...
When tanks kinda dont really exist? She's very strong in this meta where tanks dont exist and burst is king. That in itself should tell you something is wrong.

Well, the value of her damage steroid would be cut in half overall, and start strong but plummet to the minimum value over the course of a fight even against tanks. Given that around 10-30% of her damage is true damage nowadays, I suppose it'd be a 5-15% damage nerf overall, which is pretty hefty. Her play rate would certainly sink like a stone. Her WR would probably go down by 3-5%, with only die-hard mains sticking with her.
